summary: StackTeacher website project. Adding a Refund & Cancellation Policy section to the footer with Stack Teacher branding, support@stackteacher.com email, and 30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA address.

existing_features.title: Add a 'Refund Policy' link in the footer navigation alongside existing footer links (Terms, Privacy Policy, etc.) that navigates to a new /refund-policy route.

Create a new RefundPolicyPage at /refund-policy containing the full Refund & Cancellation Policy text provided by the user, with the following substitutions applied throughout: 'Careerist' replaced with 'Stack Teacher', 'compliance@careerist.com' replaced with 'support@stackteacher.com', and any address references replaced with '30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA'. The page must include all sections: the opening disclaimer, per-section refund conditions, Exceptional Refund Requests, Legal Framework (Governing Law, Dispute Resolution), and the closing contact line pointing to support@stackteacher.com.
Register the /refund-policy route in App.tsx (TanStack Router) pointing to the new RefundPolicyPage component, following the same pattern used for /terms and /privacy-policy routes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Refund & Cancellation Policy section to footer with Stack Teacher branding, support@stackteacher.com, and address 30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA
